version_description:
- Lower calling rates
Save more to call India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Vietnam, and more.
  
- Favorite contacts

- Redesigned chat screen
No more accidental tap to the calling and voice messaging buttons

- Much better overall user experiences

- Lower calling rates
Save more to call India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Vietnam, and more.
  
- Favorite contacts

- Redesigned chat screen
No more accidental tap to the calling and voice messaging buttons

- Much better overall user experiences

- Free texting
For Dingtone USA users, SMS is now free of charge.
Note: Certain conditions apply.

- MMS
Your Dingtone phone numbers can receive pictures.

- Better user experiences

- Free texting
For Dingtone USA users, SMS is now free of charge.
Note: Certain conditions apply.

- MMS
Your Dingtone phone numbers can receive pictures.

- Better user experiences
-Emergent Bug Fix
-Emergent Bug Fix

- Fax
Send Fax to any phone numbers in the world.
Simply take photos for your document and send.
Fax documents from your Dropbox account.
Get a Dingtone phone number and receive Fax.

With Dingtone, you no longer need a Fax machine!

- Free Conference Call
Business grade free conference call anytime & anywhere.
Up to 1000 callers per conference.
Free international access numbers.

- Major UI layout change
Fax, Conference Call, Call recording, Walkie Walkie and Radar search are moved to the new "Connect" tab.

- Optimized user experiences

- Fax
Send Fax to any phone numbers in the world.
Simply take photos for your document and send.
Fax documents from your Dropbox account.
Get a Dingtone phone number and receive Fax.

With Dingtone, you no longer need a Fax machine!

- Free Conference Call
Business grade free conference call anytime & anywhere.
Up to 1000 callers per conference.
Free international access numbers.

- Major UI layout change
Fax, Conference Call, Call recording, Walkie Walkie and Radar search are moved to the new "Connect" tab.

- Optimized user experiences

1. Redesigned UI for quick switching between the keypad and calls history screen.
2. You can retrieve blocked calls and SMS even you enable call block.
3. You can choose caller ID for every call you want to make. A must-have feature if you have multiple Dingtone phone numbers.
4. Edit or recall the most recent messages that you send.
5. Preview the content of a URL link that you receive.
6. Stick a chat conversation thread to the top of the message list.
7. Optimize Fax functions. Now you can add signature to any page.
8. Link and Unlink your Facebook account to Dingtone.
9. Belgium mobile phone numbers are available now. More European mobile phone numbers are coming.

- Favorite messages
- Mark unread messages

- Bug fixes

- Backup your message and call history to the cloud and restore them from the could to a new device.
- Greatly reduced calling rates to high rate countries such as Cuba, Haiti, Somalia, etc.
- Available to login with your Dingtone Phone number.
- Improve the Fax function.
- Bug fixes.

- Backup your message and call history to the cloud and restore them from the could to a new device.
- Greatly reduced calling rates to high rate countries such as Cuba, Haiti, Somalia, etc.
- Available to login with your Dingtone Phone number.
- Improve the Fax function.
- Bug fixes.
- Bug fixes.
- Bug fixes.

【Better experience on calling and texting service】
- More sweet calling tips along with a better call quality.
- Provide lower rate or even free service for users who want more texts or calling minutes.
- Free national calling service available for U.S. and some other countries now. 
【Improved on Dingtone phone number service】
- Available to renew Dingtone phone number for one year usage.
- Easier to get a real phone number with a lower price.
- More choices for good phone numbers. 
【New Arrival】
- Extra bonus for 7-day-check-in, easier to get more rewards.
- Send Money--a very convenient way to top up mobile phones for your loved ones abroad.
- Free trial voicemail, no need to pay for a year service. 
【Optimize the user interface】
- Simplify the interface, easy to check your account settings.
- New design of credits getting interface, easier to operate!
- Locate the check-in history and find out rules from the redesigned Check-in interface.

【Better experience on calling and texting service】
- More sweet calling tips along with a better call quality.
- Provide lower rate or even free service for users who want more texts or calling minutes.
- Free national calling service available for U.S. and some other countries now. 
【Improved on Dingtone phone number service】
- Available to renew Dingtone phone number for one year usage.
- Easier to get a real phone number with a lower price.
- More choices for good phone numbers. 
【New Arrival】
- Extra bonus for 7-day-check-in, easier to get more rewards.
- Send Money--a very convenient way to top up mobile phones for your loved ones abroad.
- Free trial voicemail, no need to pay for a year service. 
【Optimize the user interface】
- Simplify the interface, easy to check your account settings.
- New design of credits getting interface, easier to operate!
- Locate the check-in history and find out rules from the redesigned Check-in interface.

1. Improved notifications for text messages，never miss a text message!
2. More good phone numbers added, much easier to get your very own number!
3. Keep your Dingtone experience great on iOS 10.
4. More sweet calling tips along with a better call quality.

【CallKit Support】
Have your incoming Dingtone calls displayed fully on the lock screen.
Incoming Dingtone calls will now show up just like regular calls.
【New way to get free credits】
Earn credits for both you and your friends.

1. Have crystal internet calling and smooth international texting experience in Dingtone! 
2. Easier to port out Dingtone phone number as your SIM card number. (US only)

*France (+33) Sweden (+46) Malaysia (+60)
*Indonesia(+62) Austria (+43) Poland (+48)
